      static java.lang.String findCommonPrefix(java.lang.String sentence)
      Given a sentence, find the common prefix for all words in the sentence.
      Assuming that the words are delimited by space character, we will not find any words separately and then iterate over characters.

        public static java.lang.Boolean naiveStringMatchingOptimized(java.lang.String originalString,
                                             java.lang.String patternToSearch)
        Optimized Naive String Matching algorithm as mentioned in the problem 32.1-2 in "Introduction to Algorithm"
        Parameters:
        originalString - the original string to find pattern in.
        patternToSearch - the pattern to look for.
        Returns:
        true of the pattern is matched, false otherwise

      • findCommonPrefix

        public static java.lang.String findCommonPrefix(java.lang.String sentence)
        Given a sentence, find the common prefix for all words in the sentence.
        Assuming that the words are delimited by space character, we will not find any words separately and then iterate over characters.
